Ad Text:
Boutique Trading firm seeks CA/CPA qualified Senior Treasury Finance Manager in their Sydney head office. Flexible working on offer; 4 days in the CBD office, 1 day from home. 
  
You will;  

Build and maintain financial models to support liquidity planning, capital allocation, and funding strategy.
Take responsibility for PnL & Balance Sheet activities relating to the production of treasury & trading data. 
Lead Treasury month end reporting
Valuation of Financial instruments and Funding costs
Perform variance analysis and scenario modelling across operating and program funding streams.
Monitor portfolio performance against budget and identify key drivers, risks, and opportunities.
You will possess;
 

10 years experience in Treasury Finance / Product Control in Derivatives / Energy Trading 
CA/CPA qualification
Prior experience using data tools such as Python, Power BI, Tableau or Alteryx  
Strong Financial modelling skills 
Excellent communication skills; ability to express yourself effectively when facing off at senior levels
Ability to work as self-starter in a boutique environment (Essential)
Full Australian working rights & fluent English skills 
Please click on Apply.
